refnamediv.refpurpose: Complex unsigned 16-bit little endian IQ sample

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This format contains sequence of complex number samples. Each complex number consist two parts, called In-phase and Quadrature (IQ). Both I and Q are represented as a 16 bit unsigned little endian number. I value comes first and Q value after that.

formalpara.title: Byte Order.
formalpara.para:
Each cell is one byte.
start + 0: I'0[7:0] I'0[15:8]
start + 2: Q'0[7:0] Q'0[15:8]
